channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dow joins Nasdaq and S&P in plus column even as China retaliates — live updates
DeepSeek has tilted the balance towards open source AI, but big security issues remain
item.description: OpenAI Sam Altman says his company is "on the wrong side of history" with a business model built purely around proprietary AI models.

item.title: Why Americans will bet a record $1.39 billion on Super Bowl LIX
White House confirms Elon Musk is a ‘special government employee’ who could avoid publicly disclosing finances and conflicts of interest—and will only work for 130 days a year
item.description: Musk’s last two weeks have been marked by a frenzy of activity and a claim he’s been sleeping in the DOGE office.

item.title: HPV vaccine challenges put Merck’s stock on track for worst day in 17 years
Goldman Sachs says Trump’s tariffs could bruise stocks, estimating every 5-percentage-point increase would slash S&P 500 earnings per share by 1%–2%
item.description: Before the U-turn on tariffs, Goldman Sachs said “there is a substantial probability that the tariffs on Canada and Mexico will be temporary.”

item.title: Top Trump adviser says new tariffs will pay for eliminating taxes on tips
Tesla and Apple are the ‘Magnificent Seven’ firms hit hardest by tariff shocks
item.description: Tesla’s stock fell 5% on Monday, the biggest drop for any member of the so-called Magnificent Seven, while Apple shares dropped 3%.

item.title: Google parent Alphabet reports earnings today. Shares are near an all-time high.
Trump created the first ever U.S. sovereign wealth fund: Will it include Bitcoin?
item.description: Wyoming Sen. Cynthia Lummis sparked excitement by calling the move a “₿ig deal.”
